author: pderop
msg: Pass the bundle / bundleContext to the ServiceEventImpl constructor.

author: pderop
msg: Don't pass anymore any parameters to the Event.close() method, the ServiceEventImpl is now hodling the bundleContext necessary to
unget the service reference from the close method.
Also, don't unget the service reference in the close method if the referring bundle is not active anymore: this is not necessary in this case,
and we want to reduce IllegalStateException occurances (especially when doing benchmarks).

author: pderop
msg: Pass the bundle / bundleContext to the ServiceEventImpl constructor.

msg: The setDebug() method is now returning this component.

author: pderop
msg: Don't pass anymore any parameters to the Event.close() method.
